name: Openskye
description:
Openskye is a fast, twitchy, arcade platform shooter that incorporates RPG elements for a satisfying progression experience. I worked on it during my off time in high school.

Not only can you choose from a diverse collection of weaponry, you can also build up your characters stats to play the way you want.

Right now Openskye contains over 20 waves of content (meaning new enemies and a continuous build path)

If Openskye receives enough downloads, It'll receive updates -- new graphics, new enemies, and new weapons

Download Openskye and post your highest wave!
